mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (payment_id, payment_key, order_no, amount, status, method_code, product_name, customer_name, created_at) VALUES(#{paymentId},#{paymentKey},#{orderNo},#{amount},#{status},#{methodCode},#{productName},#{customerName},#{createdAt});
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM PAYMENT WHERE order_no = #{orderNo})
